author: COMSOL
description: This tutorial shows how to simulate coupled heat and moisture transport in a building component. The 1D model is a benchmark test defined in Norm EN 15026 for the validation of a software for the assessment of moisture transfer by numerical simulation. You can verify that the numerical results obtained with COMSOL Multiphysics are within the validity ranges specified in the norm.
label: semi_infinite_wall.mph
